Table of Contents

Class Drawable

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Drawables are the basic building blocks of a scene graph in this framework. Anything that is visible or that the user interacts with has to be a Drawable.

For example:

  • Boxes
  • Sprites
  • Collections of Drawables

Drawables are always rectangular in shape in their local coordinate system, which makes them quad-shaped in arbitrary (linearly transformed) coordinate systems.

public abstract class Drawable : Transformable, IDependencyInjectionCandidate, IDisposable, IDrawable, ITransformable, ISourceGeneratedLongRunningLoadCache, ISourceGeneratedHandleInputCache, ISourceGeneratedDependencyActivator

A name used to identify this Drawable internally.

public string Name

Field Value

string

ProcessCustomClock

Whether ProcessFrame() should be automatically invoked on this Drawable's Clock in UpdateSubTree(). This should only be set to false in scenarios where the clock is updated elsewhere.

public bool ProcessCustomClock

Field Value

bool

Properties

AcceptsFocus

If true, we will gain focus (receiving priority on keyboard input) (and receive an OnFocus(FocusEvent) event) on returning true in OnClick(ClickEvent).

public virtual bool AcceptsFocus { get; }

Property Value

bool

Alpha

Multiplicative alpha factor applied on top of ColourInfo and its existing alpha channel(s).

public float Alpha { get; set; }

Property Value

float

AlwaysPresent

If true, forces IsPresent to always be true. In other words, this drawable is always considered for layout, input, and drawing, regardless of alpha value.

public bool AlwaysPresent { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Anchor

Specifies where Origin is attached to the Parent in the coordinate system with origin at the top left corner of the Parent's DrawRectangle. Can either be one of 9 relative positions (0, 0.5, and 1 in x and y) or a fixed absolute position via RelativeAnchorPosition.

public Anchor Anchor { get; set; }

Property Value

Anchor

AnchorPosition

Specifies in absolute coordinates where Origin is attached to the Parent in the coordinate system with origin at the top left corner of the Parent's DrawRectangle.

public Vector2 AnchorPosition { get; }

Property Value

Vector2

Blending

Determines how this Drawable is blended with other already drawn Drawables. Inherits the Parent's Blending by default.

public BlendingParameters Blending { get; set; }

Property Value

BlendingParameters

Property Value

RectangleF

BypassAutoSizeAxes

Controls which Axes are ignored by parent Parent automatic sizing. Most notably, RelativePositionAxes and RelativeSizeAxes do not affect automatic sizing to avoid circular size dependencies.

public Axes BypassAutoSizeAxes { get; set; }

Property Value

Axes

ChangeFocusOnClick

If true, returning true in OnClick(ClickEvent) causes the current focus target to be unfocused.

public virtual bool ChangeFocusOnClick { get; }

Property Value

bool

Clock

The clock of this drawable. Used for keeping track of time across frames. By default is inherited from Parent. If set, then the provided value is used as a custom clock and the Parent's clock is ignored.

public override IFrameBasedClock Clock { get; set; }

Property Value

IFrameBasedClock

Colour

Colour of this Drawable in sRGB space. Can contain individual colours for all four corners of this Drawable, which are then interpolated, but can also be assigned just a single colour. Implicit casts from SRGBColour and from osuTK.Graphics.Color4 exist.

public ColourInfo Colour { get; set; }

Property Value

ColourInfo

Depth

Controls which Drawables are behind or in front of other Drawables. This amounts to sorting Drawables by their Depth. A Drawable with higher Depth than another Drawable is drawn behind the other Drawable.

public float Depth { get; set; }

Property Value

float

public virtual bool DisposeOnDeathRemoval { get; }

FillAspectRatio

The desired ratio of width to height when under the effect of a non-stretching FillMode and RelativeSizeAxes being Both.

public float FillAspectRatio { get; set; }

Property Value

float

FillMode

Controls the behavior of RelativeSizeAxes when it is set to Both. Otherwise, this member has no effect. By default, stretching is used, which simply scales this drawable's Size according to Parent's RelativeToAbsoluteFactor disregarding this drawable's FillAspectRatio. Other values of FillMode preserve FillAspectRatio.

public FillMode FillMode { get; set; }

Property Value

FillMode

HandleNonPositionalInput

Whether this Drawable handles non-positional input. This value is true by default if Handle(UIEvent) or any non-positional (e.g. keyboard related) "On-" input methods are overridden.

public virtual bool HandleNonPositionalInput { get; }

Property Value

bool

HandlePositionalInput

Whether this Drawable handles positional input. This value is true by default if Handle(UIEvent) or any positional (i.e. mouse related) "On-" input methods are overridden.

RelativeAnchorPosition

Specifies in relative coordinates where Origin is attached to the Parent in the coordinate system with origin at the top left corner of the Parent's DrawRectangle, and a value of osuTK.Vector2.One referring to the bottom right corner of the Parent's DrawRectangle.

public Vector2 RelativeAnchorPosition { get; set; }

Property Value

Vector2

RelativeOriginPosition

The origin of this Drawable expressed in relative coordinates from the top-left corner of DrawRectangle.

public Vector2 RelativeOriginPosition { get; }

Property Value

Vector2

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

If Origin is Custom.

RelativePositionAxes

Controls which Axes of Position are relative w.r.t. Parent's size (from 0 to 1) rather than absolute. The Axes set in this property are ignored by automatically sizing parents.

public Axes RelativePositionAxes { get; set; }

Property Value

Axes

Remarks

When setting this property, the Position is converted such that DrawPosition remains invariant.

RelativeSizeAxes

Controls which Axes are relative sizes w.r.t. Parent's size (from 0 to 1) in the Parent's coordinate system, rather than absolute sizes. The Axes set in this property are ignored by automatically sizing parents.

public virtual Axes RelativeSizeAxes { get; set; }

Property Value

Axes

Remarks

If an axis becomes relatively sized and its component of Size was previously 0, then it automatically becomes 1. In all other cases Size is converted such that DrawSize remains invariant across changes of this property.

RemoveWhenNotAlive

Whether to remove the drawable from its parent's children when it's not alive.

public virtual bool RemoveWhenNotAlive { get; }

Property Value

bool

RequestsFocus

If true, we are eagerly requesting focus. If nothing else above us has (or is requesting focus) we will get it.

public virtual bool RequestsFocus { get; }

Property Value

bool

Remarks

In order to get focused, HandleNonPositionalInput must be true.

LoadAsyncComplete()

Invoked after dependency injection has completed for this Drawable and all children if this is a CompositeDrawable.

protected virtual void LoadAsyncComplete()

Remarks

This method is invoked in the potentially asynchronous context of Load(IFrameBasedClock, IReadOnlyDependencyContainer, bool) prior to this Drawable becoming IsLoaded = true.

LoadComplete()

Invoked after this Drawable has finished loading.

protected virtual void LoadComplete()

Remarks

This method is invoked on the update thread inside this Drawable's UpdateSubTree().

OnClick(ClickEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.MouseButton is clicked on this Drawable.

protected virtual bool OnClick(ClickEvent e)

Parameters

e ClickEvent

The ClickEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

Whether to block the event from propagating to other Drawables in the hierarchy.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawables that received a previous OnMouseDown(MouseDownEvent) invocation which are still present in the input queue (via BuildPositionalInputQueue(Vector2, List<Drawable>)) when the click occurs.
This will not occur if a drag was started (OnDragStart(DragStartEvent) was invoked) or a double-click occurred (OnDoubleClick(DoubleClickEvent) was invoked).

OnDoubleClick(DoubleClickEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.MouseButton is double-clicked on this Drawable.

protected virtual bool OnDoubleClick(DoubleClickEvent e)

Parameters

e DoubleClickEvent

The DoubleClickEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

Whether to block the next OnClick(ClickEvent) event from occurring.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawable that returned 

true
from a previous OnClick(ClickEvent) invocation.

OnInvalidate(Invalidation, InvalidationSource)

Invoked when the layout of this Drawable was invalidated.

protected virtual bool OnInvalidate(Invalidation invalidation, InvalidationSource source)

Parameters

invalidation Invalidation

The flags that the this Drawable was invalidated with.

source InvalidationSource

The source that triggered the invalidation.

Returns

bool

Whether any custom invalidation was performed. Must be true if the DrawNode for this Drawable is to be invalidated.

Remarks

This should be used to perform any custom invalidation logic that cannot be described as a layout.

Returns

Whether to block the event from propagating to other Drawables in the hierarchy.

OnJoystickRelease(JoystickReleaseEvent)

An event that occurs when a JoystickButton is released.

protected virtual void OnJoystickRelease(JoystickReleaseEvent e)

Parameters

e JoystickReleaseEvent

The JoystickReleaseEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This is guaranteed to be invoked if OnJoystickPress(JoystickPressEvent) was invoked.

OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.Key is pressed.

protected virtual bool OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent e)

Parameters

e KeyDownEvent

The KeyDownEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

Whether to block the event from propagating to other Drawables in the hierarchy.

Remarks

Repeat events can only be invoked on the Drawables that received a previous non-repeat OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent) invocation which are still present in the input queue (via BuildNonPositionalInputQueue(List<Drawable>, bool)) when the repeat occurs.

OnKeyUp(KeyUpEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.Key is released.

protected virtual void OnKeyUp(KeyUpEvent e)

Parameters

e KeyUpEvent

The KeyUpEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This is guaranteed to be invoked if OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent) was invoked.

OnTouchDown(TouchDownEvent)

An event that occurs when a Touch is active.

protected virtual bool OnTouchDown(TouchDownEvent e)

Parameters

e TouchDownEvent

The TouchDownEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

Whether to block the event from propagating to other Drawables in the hierarchy.

OnTouchMove(TouchMoveEvent)

An event that occurs every time an active Touch has moved while hovering this Drawable.

protected virtual void OnTouchMove(TouchMoveEvent e)

Parameters

e TouchMoveEvent

The TouchMoveEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawables that received a previous OnTouchDown(TouchDownEvent) invocation from the source of this touch. This will not occur if the touch has been activated then deactivated without moving from its initial position.

OnTouchUp(TouchUpEvent)

An event that occurs when a Touch is not active.

protected virtual void OnTouchUp(TouchUpEvent e)

Parameters

e TouchUpEvent

The TouchUpEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This is guaranteed to be invoked if OnTouchDown(TouchDownEvent) was invoked.

Trigger a UI event with Target set to this Drawable.

Parameters

e UIEvent

The event. Its Target will be modified.

Returns

bool

The result of event handler.

Update()

Performs a once-per-frame update specific to this Drawable. A more elegant alternative to OnUpdate when deriving from Drawable. Note, that this method is always called before Drawables further down the scene graph are updated.

protected virtual void Update()

UpdateSubTree()

Updates this Drawable and all Drawables further down the scene graph. Called once every frame.

public virtual bool UpdateSubTree()

Returns

bool

False if the drawable should not be updated.

UpdateSubTreeMasking()

Updates all masking calculations for this Drawable. This occurs post-UpdateSubTree() to ensure that all Drawable updates have taken place.

public virtual bool UpdateSubTreeMasking()

Returns

bool

Whether masking calculations have taken place.

WithEffect<T>(IEffect<T>, Action<T>)

Returns the drawable created by applying the given effect to this drawable. This method may add this drawable to a container. If this drawable should be the child of another container, make sure to add the created drawable to the container instead of this drawable.

public T WithEffect<T>(IEffect<T> effect, Action<T> initializationAction = null) where T : Drawable

Parameters

effect IEffect<T>

The effect to apply to this drawable.

initializationAction Action<T>

The action that should get called to initialize the created drawable before it is returned.

Returns

T

The drawable created by applying the given effect to this drawable.

Type Parameters

T

The type of the drawable that results from applying the given effect.

Events

OnLoadComplete

This event is fired after the LoadComplete() method is called. It should be used when a simple action should be performed when the Drawable is loaded which does not warrant overriding the Drawable. This event is automatically cleared after being invoked.

public event Action<Drawable> OnLoadComplete

Event Type

Action<Drawable>

OnUpdate

This event is fired after the Update() method is called at the end of UpdateSubTree(). It should be used when a simple action should be performed at the end of every update call which does not warrant overriding the Drawable.

public event Action<Drawable> OnUpdate

Event Type

Action<Drawable>
